name: Youtube Notification Bot
description: A Normal Telegram Bot Which Notify You When Your Selected Content Creators Post A Video.

APP_ID.description: You api id, from my.telegram.org or @apiScrapperRoBot.

API_HASH.description: You api hash, from my.telegram.org or @apiScrapperRoBot.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Make a bot from @BotFather, and enter it's api token here.

OWNER.description: Get ur Id Of Telegram nd Paste Here.

CHAT.description: Get ur Id of Telegram or telegram Channel or group where bot is admin nd Paste Here.

YT_CHANNEL_ID.description: Get Id of a youtube channel [Multi Channel Supported, with a space.

DELAY_TIME.description: Always In Minutes, check in every 'x' minutes that new video is posted or not.

DOWNLOAD_VIDEO.description: in 'True/False', if want to download video with notification so set True else False.
